entries.journal_entry_description: You will need organics in addition to minerals. Use the resources that Raine gave you to make a Flora Survey Tool.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Another useful device is the Flora Survey Tool. Use the resources that Raine gave you to create a Flora Survey Tool.   To use the crafting tool: Double-click on the generic crafting tool in your inventory. Double-click on the schematic that you wish to use.  Double-click on the appropriate resources. Only resources that you can use will be available. Once you decide what resources to use, press the Assemble button. Press Yes to confirm that you want to make the item. If you cancel after this point, you lose the resources. You will see how successful the item is. Press Next to continue. Press Create Object to complete the item.  Press Yes to confirm. The item will be complete in a few seconds.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You made the Flora Survey Tool. Talk to Raine and show him what you made. He will reward you for your instruction.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Talk to Raine in Hangar Bay 2
